mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.content AS "content", a.title AS "title", a.file_ids AS "fileIds", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", f.fileId AS "files.fileid", f.contentType AS "files.contentType", f.size AS "files.size", t.id AS "postType.id", t.name AS "postType.name", u.userName AS "user.username", u.nickName AS "user.nickname"
LEFT JOIN w_upload_file f ON f.targetId=a.id LEFT JOIN w_user u ON u.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN w_post_type t ON a.typeId=t.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM w_post a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO w_post( id, content, title, file_ids, user_id, create_date, update_date, typeId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{content}, #{title}, #{fileIds}, #{user.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{postType.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE w_post SET content = #{content}, title=#{title}, file_ids = #{fileIds}, user_id = #{user.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, typeId=#{postType.id} WHERE id = #{id}
